Entries.summer_1_1: My grandpa showed me photographs of the Pride marches he went to when he was younger.$0#$b#They were a bit of a riot!$1
Entries.summer_1_2: My grandpa showed me photographs of the Pride marches he went to when he was younger.$0#$b#They were a bit of a riot!$1

Entries.summer_1_1: So many literary greats were queer, and I'm just following in their footsteps...$1
Entries.summer_1_2: So many literary greats were queer, and I'm just following in their footsteps...$1

Entries.summer_1_1: Healthcare in the queer community has had its problems, but I'm dedicated to offering the best service I can.$0#$b#No gatekeeping here!$1
Entries.summer_1_2: Healthcare in the queer community has had its problems, but I'm dedicated to offering the best service I can.$0#$b#No gatekeeping here!$1

Entries.summer_1_1: I don't think Vincent quite gets Pride, but I'm glad to walk with him during the march.$0#$b#Being trans sure is better when your family is supportive.$1
Entries.summer_1_2: I don't think Vincent quite gets Pride, but I'm glad to walk with him during the march.$0#$b#Being trans sure is better when your family is supportive.$1

Entries.summer_1_1: I hear Grampleton Pride always involves protest about its mayor.$0#$b#Mayor Lewis says we're not to throw stones in solidarity, though.$1
Entries.summer_1_2: I hear Grampleton Pride always involves protest about its mayor.$0#$b#Mayor Lewis says we're not to throw stones in solidarity, though.$1

Entries.summer_1_1: It's been difficult to accept myself as I am...$0#$b#But the Pride march here has never been less than welcoming!$1
Entries.summer_1_2: It's been difficult to accept myself as I am...$0#$b#But the Pride march here has never been less than welcoming!$1

Entries.summer_1_1: Hey @, if you need some queer movies to watch tonight, I have a few recommendations...
Entries.summer_1_2: Hey @, if you need some queer movies to watch tonight, I have a few recommendations...
Entries.summer_1: Hey @, if you need some queer movies to watch tonight, I have a few recommendations...

Entries.summer_1_1: See these pride leis? I hand-dyed all of them!
Entries.summer_1_2: See these pride leis? I hand-dyed all of them!

Entries.summer_1_1: I always take the best photos at Pride.$0#$b#Plus, I can support my sister as she marches!
Entries.summer_1_2: I always take the best photos at Pride.$0#$b#Plus, I can support my sister as she marches!

Entries.summer_1_1: The first pride was a protest! And don't let anyone forget it!$1
Entries.summer_1_2: The first pride was a protest! And don't let anyone forget it!$1
Entries.summer_1: The first pride was a protest! And don't let anyone forget it!$1

Entries.summer_1_1: Hey @. Enjoying pride?#$b#I've walked with my dad in the march ever since I can remember.
Entries.summer_1_2: Hey @. Enjoying pride?#$b#I've walked with my dad in the march ever since I can remember.
Entries.summer_1: Hey @. Enjoying pride?#$b#I've walked with my dad in the march ever since I can remember.

Entries.summer_1_1: Mom always walks with me in the March.$0#$b#She's been so supportive, ever since I came out and transitioned. I'm so glad!$1
Entries.summer_1_2: Mom always walks with me in the March.$0#$b#She's been so supportive, ever since I came out and transitioned. I'm so glad!$1

Entries.summer_1_1: Back in the day, I went to Grampleton Pride. I used to throw stones at the city hall - the mayor was the most bigoted man!$1#$b#I promise I won't throw stones in protest this year...$0
Entries.summer_1_2: Back in the day, I went to Grampleton Pride. I used to throw stones at the city hall - the mayor was the most bigoted man!$1#$b#I promise I won't throw stones in protest this year...$0

Entries.summer_1_1: Ace folk like myself sometimes struggle with our identities.$0#$b#But Pride helps me feel like I belong!$1
Entries.summer_1_2: Ace folk like myself sometimes struggle with our identities.$0#$b#But Pride helps me feel like I belong!$1

Entries.summer_1_1: My family have walked in Pride every year since Robin and I married.
Entries.summer_1_2: My family have walked in Pride every year since Robin and I married.

Entries.summer_1_1: Your people gleam like rubies and emeralds this time of year.
Entries.summer_1_2: Your people gleam like rubies and emeralds this time of year.

Entries.summer_1_1: George took me to my first Pride. It was such a shock to me back then!$1
Entries.summer_1_2: George took me to my first Pride. It was such a shock to me back then!$1

Entries.summer_1_1: Didn't think I would be one for Pride?$1#$b#Bi men like myself always have a place here. Although I can't exactly fight the police anymore...
Entries.summer_1_2: Didn't think I would be one for Pride?$1#$b#Bi men like myself always have a place here. Although I can't exactly fight the police anymore...

Entries.summer_1_1: Bear pride!$1
Entries.summer_1_2: Bear pride!$1

Entries.summer_1_1: I love all the pride leis!
Entries.summer_1_2: I love all the pride leis!

Entries.summer_1_1: I've been going to Pride since before my sons were born.$1
Entries.summer_1_2: I've been going to Pride since before my sons were born.$1

Entries.summer_1_1: The crowds trip my PTSD, so I stay inside during the march.$0#$b#But I always sit by the window and wave. I don't want my son to think I don't support him.
Entries.summer_1_2: The crowds trip my PTSD, so I stay inside during the march.$0#$b#But I always sit by the window and wave. I don't want my son to think I don't support him.

Entries.summer_1_1: There are so many colours up top this time of year.
Entries.summer_1_2: There are so many colours up top this time of year.

Entries.summer_1_1: Queer folk, or ta'ota tupoi have always been supported in my community, so a Pride march is a bit of a novelty.$1
Entries.summer_1_2: Queer folk, or ta'ota tupoi have always been supported in my community, so a Pride march is a bit of a novelty.$1

Entries.summer_1_1: The fisrt Pride here was a protest. A number of villagers took part.$0#$b#It's still a protest now, but hopefully Caroline does't feel the need to pelt my window with rocks!$1
Entries.summer_1_2: The fisrt Pride here was a protest. A number of villagers took part.$0#$b#It's still a protest now, but hopefully Caroline does't feel the need to pelt my window with rocks!$1

Entries.summer_1_1: I don't feel comfortable with the crowds, so you won't find me marching.$0#$b#But seeing everyone walk by my tent all rainbow coloured is nice.$1
Entries.summer_1_2: I don't feel comfortable with the crowds, so you won't find me marching.$0#$b#But seeing everyone walk by my tent all rainbow coloured is nice.$1

Entries.summer_1_1: Happy Pride, @! How's your day been?
Entries.summer_1_2: Happy Pride, @! How's your day been?

Entries.summer_1_1: I've walked with Penny in the march every year since she transitioned.$0#$b#We've had our problems, but I'm so proud of her...$1
Entries.summer_1_2: I've walked with Penny in the march every year since she transitioned.$0#$b#We've had our problems, but I'm so proud of her...$1

Entries.summer_1_1: I met Caroline at a Pride march in Grampleton.$1#$b#She was throwing stones at the councillor's office because he wouldn't support same-sex marriage.
Entries.summer_1_2: I met Caroline at a Pride march in Grampleton.$1#$b#She was throwing stones at the councillor's office because he wouldn't support same-sex marriage.

Entries.summer_1_1: Demetrius has always walked with Maru in the march.$0#$b#Sebastian finds it embarassing if I walk with him, though.$1
Entries.summer_1_2: Demetrius has always walked with Maru in the march.$0#$b#Sebastian finds it embarassing if I walk with him, though.$1

Entries.summer_1_1: I always go over to the valley on Pride. Gotta show that lesbian pride!$1
Entries.summer_1_2: I always go over to the valley on Pride. Gotta show that lesbian pride!$1

Entries.summer_1_1: My brother takes me to Pride every year!$1
Entries.summer_1_2: My brother takes me to Pride every year!$1

Entries.summer_1_1: I remember our first Pride. It was just me, Lewis, George, Evelyn and a handful of others.$1#$b#Of course, most of the young'ns didn't live here then.$0
Entries.summer_1_2: I remember our first Pride. It was just me, Lewis, George, Evelyn and a handful of others.$1#$b#Of course, most of the young'ns didn't live here then.$0

Entries.summer_1_1: The Junimos are always happiest on Pride. I think it's the colours.
Entries.summer_1_2: The Junimos are always happiest on Pride. I think it's the colours.

Entries.PrideParade: @,^Always remember... even though it's hard out there... no matter your identity, there is always a place for you in the valley!^^-Lewis%item object 74 1 %%
